idea-plugin.name: Ayu Islands
idea-plugin.description:
Ayu Mirage color palette meets modern Islands UI — warm gold accents, rounded panels, and carefully tuned contrast for long coding sessions.

Features

  • Full Islands Dark UI with rounded panels and island gaps
  • Ayu Mirage syntax highlighting — keywords, strings, functions, types
  • Language-specific colors for HCL/Terraform, Go, Python, JS/TS, Markdown, YAML, JSON
  • Tuned VCS colors, diff gutters, and terminal palette
  • Compact mode support
  • Project color gradients in Ayu hues
